status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this dian.fu. It is caused by concurrently recycling exclusive and floating buffers by both task thread and canceller thread, and it is only valid in release-1.10 branch. I will consider how to fix it properly.
